channel.title: kernel on Morgoth
channel.description: Recent content in kernel on Morgoth

item.title: kernel
item.description: Kernel command 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 lsmod 查看已加载的模块 # /proc/modules rmmod <name> 删除模块 modprobe -c 查看已编译可加载的内核模块 modprobe <name> 加载模块 # /etc/modules modprobe -r <name> 删除模块 // modprobe 重启就没了 echo "ipmi_devintf" >> /etc/modules
